title: forge
author: dignity、辰
txt_content: 敢问各位大佬，为什么我打开启动器，下载安装好的forge没弹出来？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: forge 选择的安装位置正确了吗

replies.author: IamtheDoctor
replies.txt_content: 需要在启动器设置forge启动

replies.author: 小诸葛1
replies.txt_content: 你把下载好的forge界面发出来

replies.author: 孙翌轩
replies.txt_content: 正版启动器要选择forge所在的目录，从而启动游戏
